name: SportsRecap
0:
”Alexa, ask Sports Recap for the Red Sox recap.”
”Alexa, ask Sports Recap to read the Royals and Red Sox recap.”
”Alexa, get the Indians recap from Sports Recap.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports recap
des: Stay on top of your favorite sports and teams with the Sports Recap Skill. Simply ask the Sports Recap Skill for the recap about the team or teams you're interested in. For the Cardinals, Giants, Jets, Kings, Panthers, and Rangers make sure you include the city name as well so Alexa knows which team you're talking about.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
